title: Anthea Turner and Grant Bovey have divorced
text:
Anthea Turner and Grant Bovey have divorced Anthea Turner and Grant Bovey have divorced Share 
Ex-Blue Peter presenter Anthea Turner and her husband Grant Bovey have divorced. 
The 55-year-old TV star was granted a decree nisi at a hearing which took two minutes at the Central Family Court in London before District Judge Heather MacGregor. (Matt Alexander/PA) 
The undefended petition was granted on the grounds of her husband‚Äôs adultery. 
It was sixth on a list of 25 couples seeking ‚Äúquickie‚Äù divorces. 
Anthea recently showed she was getting on with life after the end of her marriage by appearing on Channel 4‚Ä≤s Celebrity First Dates. Will @AntheaTurner1 land a new number on her phone after her date, or will Jeremy stay glued to his? üì± #FirstDates pic.twitter.com/MOduSV0giA Share article
